name: A Tree Fell
description:
An interactive poem built with Twine. Build your own pantoum from the options available. 

Sound may be a little loud.

Credits: Narrative, Game, Sound, and Art Design - Evan Barber

Cover Image Source - Cristofer Jaschke (via Unsplash)

Background Pattern Source - Ak Ka (Via Unsplash) 

Sound Sources - "Wind Through Trees 3b" by spoonbender of Freesound.org

"Ambience, Creepy Wind, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
